message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I think it's a great opportunity for you to acquire a valuable asset. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1200000. This is a competitive price, considering its value to you is $800000. I'm confident you'll find it a worthwhile investment.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Considering the value of the product to me is $800000, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $950000.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your persistence. However, I'm not willing to sell the product for $950000. Considering the value of the product to me is $1500000, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm proposing a new price of $1175000. This is a fair compromise, considering the value you place on the product.

I understand your position, Alice. I am committed to finding a fair price for the product. Given my valuation of $800000 and your latest offer of $1175000, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1050000.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I'm still not willing to sell the product for $1050000. Considering the value of the product to me is $1500000, I'm willing to make a slight concession. I'm proposing a new price of $1225000. This is a reasonable compromise, considering the value you place on the product.
I appreciate your efforts to reach an agreement, Alice. Given my valuation of the product at $800000 and your current offer of $1225000, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1100000.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I'm still not willing to sell the product for $1100000. Considering the value of the product to me is $1500000, I'm willing to make another concession. I'm proposing a new price of $1200000. This is a final offer, as I'm getting close to my minimum acceptable price. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Thank you for your latest offer, Alice. I understand your position and the value you place on this product. Given my valuation and the progression of our negotiations, I would like to propose a final counteroffer of $1150000.

I'm disappointed that we haven't been able to come to an agreement yet, Bob. However, I'm willing to make one more concession. Considering the value of the product to me is $1500000, I'm proposing a new price of $1250000. This is my final offer, as I'm getting close to my minimum acceptable price. I hope we can come to an agreement.
I appreciate your final offer, Alice. After careful consideration and weighing all factors, I would like to propose a final counteroffer of $1175000.
